contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Feel free to reach out for any inquiries or questions.
contact.contactInfoTitle: Contact with Us for Any Help
contact.contactInfoDescription: Looking for your perfect rental home? Have questions about our services? We’re here to help! At Noot, we make it easy to find and rent homes that suit your lifestyle. Whether you need assistance with a booking, have inquiries about a property, or just want to learn more about how we connect renters with trusted listings, feel free to reach out to us.
contact.messageDescription: We’d love to hear from you! Whether you have questions, feedback, or need support, feel free to reach out to us.
contact.name: Name
contact.subject: Subject

about.aboutNootDescription: Noot is a leading online platform for renting and selling homes, apartments, and offices. Our mission is to create a seamless, convenient, and trustworthy experience for renters and homeowners alike.
about.ourStoryDescription: Founded in 2015, Noot has grown from a small startup to a thriving, global community of homeowners and renters. Our team of experienced professionals and dedicated supporters have helped us create a platform that empowers people to find and rent homes that meet their needs and expectations.
about.ourPromise: Our Promise: Quality, Convenience & Secure Rentals
about.findPerfectHome: Find your perfect home with confidence through our trusted network of verified listings, seamless booking, and dedicated support.
about.savingsDescription: Our rental service helps you find the perfect home at the best price, without hidden fees or hassle.
about.supportTitle: 24/7 Assistance for a Smooth Rental Experience
about.supportDescription: Our team is available around the clock to assist you with any rental inquiries or concerns.
about.dealsDescription: Get the best deals on top rental properties, ensuring comfort and affordability.
about.ourPartnersDescription: Partner with Trusted Rental Experts to Find Your Ideal Home with Ease and Confidence.
about.blogDescription: Stay informed with the latest trends, tips, and updates in the rental market.

mobileApp.title: Download Mobile App
mobileApp.subtitle: We Are Available On the Store Get Our Mobile Apps
mobileApp.description: We offer carefully curated rental properties that capture the true essence of comfortable living. Our rental app saves you more than traditional methods by providing an all-in-one solution for finding and booking homes.
